relevant_findings.physical_examination: Chest clear, normal heart sounds, mildly tender abdomen without rebound or guarding, no organomegaly, firm and fixed nontender mass, 3 cm by 3 cm in right inguinal region, rectal tenderness on digital examination, patient alert and oriented, neurologic exam normal.

Left-sided facial droop noted, motor strength on right side normal, 4/5 on left side with left pronator drift, poor coordination of finger-to-nose and heel-to-shin movements on the left side, positive Romberg test, neck supple but headache worse with neck flexion.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Left-sided facial droop was not seen the following day, indicating improvement.

relevant_findings.physical_examination: Patient appeared chronically ill, small white lesion on inferior aspect of tongue, no cervical or axillary lymphadenopathy, inspiratory crackles at left lung base, normal heart sounds, soft and nontender abdomen, normal bowel sounds, right-sided inguinal mass, 3 cm by 1 cm in size with recent incision.
